author: dennisl
msg: Add a pom for commons-logging-api that can be deployed to the Maven repository.

Compared to the normal project.xml file all dependencies except junit has been removed. I also removed a few things related to testing in order to be able to build the jar with Maven after the dependencies were removed.
This will help solve an issue reported on the user-list:

author: bravi
msg: [YOKO-143] Adding KEYS to the trunk for signed releases & also updated the snapshot deployment configuration.

author: mikem
msg: This patch fixes the sql query used in the SYSCS_BULK_INSERT procedure to
correctly use the optimizer hints using --DERBY-PROPERTIES clause instead of

author: mturyn
msg: All bridges now have "require()" statements for their widget---e.g. DojoFloatingPaneBridge explicitly calls for dojo.widget.FloatingPane.
